audioText: Il rentrera certainement à la maison quand il aura fini son travail de nettoyage.
question: Il ______ certainement à la maison quand il aura fini son travail de nettoyage.
explanation: The text states 'Il rentrera certainement à la maison quand il aura fini son travail de nettoyage' - He will certainly come home when he has finished his cleaning work. 'Rentrera' is the future form of 'rentrer' (to return home), targeting missing verb conjugate with cleanliness/house themes.
